meanings.definition: To mention separately as if in counting; name one by one; specify, as in a list.
meanings.sent1: She was enumerating the different colors of the rainbow.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was enumerating the students' names for attendance.
meanings.sent3: While enumerating the ingredients for the recipe, she accidentally added salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a busy library, constantly enumerating all the tasks he needed to complete.
meanings.sent5: The detective was meticulously enumerating the clues to solve the mystery.

meanings.definition: To ascertain the number of; count.
meanings.sent1: The scientist was enumerating the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: He spent hours enumerating the coins in his piggy bank.
meanings.sent3: While enumerating the sheep, he fell asleep counting.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a mathematician, constantly enumerating the beats per minute.
meanings.sent5: The botanist was meticulously enumerating the petals on the flower.
